price: Lalle ne, Allah ne Mai tsãgewar ƙwãyar hatsi da kwalfar gurtsu. Yanã fitar da mai rai daga mamaci, kuma (Shi) Mai fitar da mamaci ne daga mai rai,* wannan ne Allah. To, yãya ake karkatar da ku?
arabic: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ فَالِقُ ٱلۡحَبِّ وَٱلنَّوَىٰۖ يُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡحَيَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَيِّتِ وَمُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡمَيِّتِ مِنَ ٱلۡحَيِّۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ
footnotes: * Mai ĩmãni daga kãfiri kõ kãfiri daga mai ĩmãni, da mai arziki daga matalauci da matalauci daga mawadãci, sarki daga talaka da talaka daga sarki,da mai sanyi daga mai zãfi ko mai zãfi daga mai sanyi, haka dai ga kõme Allah Yanã fitar da kĩshiyarsa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha fāliqu al-ḥabi wal-nawā yukh'riju al-ḥaya mina al-mayiti wamukh'riju al-mayiti mina al-ḥayi dhālikumu al-lahu fa-annā tu'fakūna
